name: WorkFlowy [full width list]
description:
Displays the main WorkFlowy.com list in full width of the page.

Works well with my other styles:
style 125601
style 125599
style 125598
style 125597
additional_info:
VERSION 2, 17.3.2016

- fixed full width property for new WorkFlowy.com layout

VERSION 1, 15.3.2016

- initial release
